SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications 15

notes.text: WebCore/platform/network/soup/SocketStreamHandleImplSoup.cpp in the libsoup network backend of WebKit, as used in WebKitGTK+ prior to version 2.20.0 or without libsoup 2.62.0, unexpectedly failed to use system proxy settings for WebSocket connections. As a result, users could be deanonymized by crafted web sites via a WebSocket connection.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

product_id: SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15:libjavascriptcoregtk-4_0-18-2.22.5-3.13.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15:libwebkit2gtk-4_0-37-2.22.5-3.13.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15:libwebkit2gtk3-lang-2.22.5-3.13.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15:webkit2gtk-4_0-injected-bundles-2.22.5-3.13.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications 15:typelib-1_0-JavaScriptCore-4_0-2.22.5-3.13.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications 15:typelib-1_0-WebKit2-4_0-2.22.5-3.13.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications 15:typelib-1_0-WebKit2WebExtension-4_0-2.22.5-3.13.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications 15:webkit2gtk3-devel-2.22.5-3.13.1

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 11.3 is affected. Safari before 11.1 is affected. iCloud before 7.4 on Windows is affected. iTunes before 12.7.4 on Windows is affected. tvOS before 11.3 is affected. watchOS before 4.3 is affected. The issue involves the "WebKit" component. It allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted web site.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

notes.title: Vulnerability Description

SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15:libwebkit2gtk-4_0-37-2.22.5-3.13.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15:libwebkit2gtk3-lang-2.22.5-3.13.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Basesystem 15:webkit2gtk-4_0-injected-bundles-2.22.5-3.13.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications 15:typelib-1_0-JavaScriptCore-4_0-2.22.5-3.13.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications 15:typelib-1_0-WebKit2-4_0-2.22.5-3.13.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications 15:typelib-1_0-WebKit2WebExtension-4_0-2.22.5-3.13.1
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Desktop Applications 15:webkit2gtk3-devel-2.22.5-3.13.1

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".

notes.text: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved memory handling. This issue affected versions prior to iOS 12.1.1, tvOS 12.1.1, watchOS 5.1.2, Safari 12.0.2, iTunes 12.9.2 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 7.9.

notes.text: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memory handling. This issue affected versions prior to iOS 12.1.1, tvOS 12.1.1, watchOS 5.1.2, Safari 12.0.2, iTunes 12.9.2 for Windows, iCloud for Windows 7.9.
